wire [ 0 : 17] Fire[ 0 : 9];
assign Fire[0] = 18'b110000000000000000;
assign Fire[1] = 18'b111000000111100000;
assign Fire[2] = 18'b111111011111000000;
assign Fire[3] = 18'b111111111111111000;
assign Fire[4] = 18'b111111111111111110;
assign Fire[5] = 18'b011111111111111111;
assign Fire[6] = 18'b011111111111111000;
assign Fire[7] = 18'b001111111111110000;
assign Fire[8] = 18'b000011111111100000;
assign Fire[9] = 18'b000000111111000000;
